thread.section_title: DIY Awards Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DIY Awards | diyawards.com
thread.title: Juanita

author: Juanita
title: Juanita
text: I could not believe how simple and easy it was to create an award. There are lots to choose from and you can say whatever you want. The design department was in constant communication and was willing to make even the smallest change to get my award just right. Delivery was fast and arrived a day ahead of schedule. The award was beautiful and the recipient loved it! A friend recommended DIY to me and I will recommend it to others as well.
